title: Drawing, July 21, 1892
medium: Brush and watercolor, white gouache, graphite on light tan wove paper
markings: Recto: Stamped in ink, lower left: Museum for the Arts of Decoration Cooper Union [Lugt 457d].
signed: Signed with initials and dated in graphite, lower left: July  21st 92  TM ; and again with monogram and dated in pen and black ink, lower left:  TM / 1892
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, lower left: July 21st 92 TM. Dead since first visit in -71; at mid-sheet, under white gouache: old sketch of this; at upper left, under green watercolor: wooded hills; at right, under blue watercolor: hole.
description: In the center, a hot spring of water, steam and salt deposits is rendered in white, red and yellow tones. At left, in the distance, a wooded mountain under a deep blue sky.

exhibitions.title: Frederic Church, Winslow Homer & Thomas Moran: Tourism and the American Landscape

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, July 21, 1892.
July 21, 1892. Brush and watercolor, white gouache, graphite on light tan wove paper. Gift of Thomas Moran. 1917-17-70.
